meanings.definition: The quality or state of being huge.
meanings.sent1: The hugenesses of the mountain amazed us.
meanings.sent2: The hugenesses of the elephant made it stand out in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The hugenesses of the cake made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The hugenesses of the task ahead seemed insurmountable.
meanings.sent5: The hugenesses of the waves crashing against the shore were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being immense in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The hugenesses of the desert stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: The hugenesses of the library overwhelmed the students.
meanings.sent3: The hugenesses of the traffic jam caused frustration among drivers.
meanings.sent4: The hugenesses of the starry sky at night filled me with wonder.
meanings.sent5: The hugenesses of the canyon took our breath away.
